scripts.publish:latest: yarn prepare:prepare minor && lerna publish from-git --no-git-reset --no-git-tag-version --no-verify-access --no-push
scripts.publish:next: SHA=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) && lerna publish preminor --exact --canary --preid next.${SHA} --dist-tag next --no-git-reset --no-git-tag-version --no-push --ignore-scripts --yes --no-verify-access
